data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Al Batinah North, Oman that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Batinah North, Oman

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Al Batinah North, Oman.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 153 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Al Batinah North, Oman.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Al Batinah North, Oman will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Harasi, Arabized people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Harasi, Arabized people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Harasi, Arabized people is yours.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Al Batinah North, Oman.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Al Batinah North to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Batinah North, Oman has a population of 471,000.

We estimate Al Batinah North has 3,077 people who might know Jesus, 10,336 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 457,587 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Al Batinah North, Oman.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
